com.intel.util

Class StoragePathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.util.StoragePathUtils

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class StoragePathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for obtaining commonly used storage paths.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.io.File getAssetsStorageDir(android.content.Context context) 
      static java.io.File getAudioStorageDir(android.content.Context context) 
      static java.io.File getExternalStoragePathForDirectory(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String... directories)
      Constructs an absolute path to a directory in the app's external storage by appending the provided directories to it.
      static java.io.File getInternalStoragePathForDirectory(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String... directories)
      Constructs an absolute path to a directory in the app's internal storage by appending the provided directories to it.
      static java.lang.String getInternalStoragePathForFile(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String... directories)
      Constructs an absolute path to a file in the app's internal storage by appending the provided directories and file names to it.

    • Method Detail

      • getAssetsStorageDir

        @NonNull
public static java.io.File getAssetsStorageDir(@NonNull
                                                        android.content.Context context)
        Returns:
        path where assets are stored.

      • getAudioStorageDir

        @Nullable
public static java.io.File getAudioStorageDir(@NonNull
                                                        android.content.Context context)
        Returns:
        path where audio coach data is stored or null in case we can't determine audio storage dir.

      • getExternalStoragePathForDirectory

        @Nullable
public static java.io.File getExternalStoragePathForDirectory(@NonNull
                                                                        android.content.Context context,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        java.lang.String... directories)
        Constructs an absolute path to a directory in the app's external storage by appending the provided directories to it. If external storage is not available, then this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        directories - Directories that should be appended to the app's external storage path.
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the constructed directory in external storage.

      • getInternalStoragePathForFile

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String getInternalStoragePathForFile(@NonNull
                                                                      android.content.Context context,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      java.lang.String... directories)
        Constructs an absolute path to a file in the app's internal storage by appending the provided directories and file names to it.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        fileName - The file name to construct the path for.
        directories - Directories that should be appended to the app's internal storage path.
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the given file in internal storage.

      • getInternalStoragePathForDirectory

        @NonNull
public static java.io.File getInternalStoragePathForDirectory(@NonNull
                                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       java.lang.String... directories)
        Constructs an absolute path to a directory in the app's internal storage by appending the provided directories to it.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        directories - Directories that should be appended to the app's internal storage path.
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the constructed directory in internal storage.
